text.data: [character][0x1]...[end]
Wake up...[end]
[character][0x1]... Dragnar. Wake up... The time has come.[end]
Now, open the gate, and come to me...[end]
[character][0x1]: Ungh...[end]
Everybody...[end]
Zora: Princess... Are you alright?[end]
I am the Holy Dragon Jormungand. Inside the desert temple I await. Now, I shall tell you... We Holy Dragons... ...need you.[end]
[character][0x1]: The Holy Dragon Jormungand... is calling me. I must go...[end]
Zora: Don't overdo it. We're the only ones who can fight.[end]
[character][0x1]: I must go... Jormungand... wants to tell me something.[end]

Matelite: Oh yeah, [character][0x1]! I have good news!
We defeated Sauzer!! The revival of Kahna is very soon![end]
[character][0x1]!![end]

Taicho: We defeated General Palpaleos as well...
On the battlefield one must be heartless...
[character][0x1]... I am relieved that you are better![end]
[character][0x1]... Don't worry... I'm here.[end]
General... Palpaleos...[end]

Palpaleos: [character][0x1]... I lost...
Your friends... The Resistance has become powerful.[end]
[character][0x0]... Matelite... Taicho...[end]
[character][0x1]... I don't mind them being by your side...[end]
Who will you choose now, [character][0x1]...[end]
A new era... If it comes, I will come to you...[end]
Garuda: Girl... Dragnar... Is this what you desire... It is nothing but a feeble dream...[end]
A feeble dream... Even so, it's one I can't make come true...[end]
The other one... Emperor Sauzer... Right now, he's...[end]
I want the courage to believe that...[end]

Garuda: Girl who holds onto feeble dreams...
Why do you think so... With our power, this world would be yours. You would have everything you ever wanted.[end]

Even if this world became mine... There are things that can't change...
From the feelings of people far away from home, to the human heart... These can never be changed...[end]
Garuda: Do not grieve, Princess... You have read the minds of we Holy Dragons thus far... You have come to control us. You are faring better than the other who can speak with the Holy Dragons...[end]
I sense faint signs of life... The man of your dreams is also safe... Do not worry... That is not the sort of thing you should desire to know...[end]
Garuda... If everything I have wished for will really come true, there is something I want...[end]
Chapter 1. The Holy Drago. Jormungan[end][end]
